isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 5000, 9100, 9200, 9400, AND 9900 MODELS - LIGHT SYSTEMS - DESCRIPTION - Work Light With 48 and 60 Inch Box Sleeper

svcproc.title: Work Light With 48 and 60 Inch Box Sleeper
svcproc.para: The work light circuit consists of two work lights, a work light switch, and an indicator light located in the instrument cluster. These lights are located on the back of the sleeper and provide light for the operator when the trailer air and electrical lines are being connected or disconnected from the trailer.
